评论详情: Perfect for a punk emo goth birthday party theme!

评论概述: So cute and flattering for big hips
评论详情: Very cute, flattering. Comfy and stretchy. Not super high quality but it’s good enough.
I did not expect this to fit or look cute on but it really does! It’s stretchy but structured, and loose in the tummy area so it’s very flattering.
Dress was true to size and cute just as pictured. Material was soft and comfy. Definitely recommend!

Oh my god! This dress is so cute! It is comfortable. I recently filmed a music video with my band and bought this dress for that purpose. It allowed me to stay cool during filming. Everyone kept telling me I looked like Alice. The fit was perfect. There are 2 things about the dress I wish I could change. First, it is hand wash only. Second, the zipper on the side bunches up, which you can see in the second photo. Honestly the material is so stretchy that the zipper isn’t really needed. If you are looking for a cute emo dress I would recommend this in a heartbeat.
My daughter absolutely loves this dress . Has worn it multiple times and it holds up well in the wash.
And this dress fit perfect. I got the double XL and had a great time plus it shows your boobs

Super cute just like picture and super comfortable not to heavy and not made out of the cheap fabric you sometimes get. Very soft and light weight. I’m 160lbs~ and 5’2 and a d cup I normally wear med sometimes large the reviews said to up size so I got a large and it fits perfect can’t wait to wear it this weekend

This dress was perfect for the concert my boyfriend and I saw this past Monday (August 7th) I got a lot of compliments from friends and people from the event where we went to. Definitely true to size and very light not too heavy to dance around in. I give all thumbs up!
I'm a 6 ft. 140 ib. Trans girl and the large fits perfectly. The waist is just stretchy enough and the shoulder cover is very flattering.
I love this dress but just one problem. The zipper didn’t lay flat!! So disappointing since it’s so cute

I'm 5'1", 137 lbs, bought a size medium.  Dress fits great! It's not too short, it's comfortable, cute, and nice quality. The looseness in the center above the boob window was fixed by pulling the sleeves down a little.  Paid 24 usd - would def buy again!

I love how soft and stretchy it is, but the fabric wrinkles super easily, so I feel like it requires more upkeep than other dresses, in regards to having to steam/dry/iron for the wrinkles. Don't let it sit in the dryer or it will come out crumpled.
It was slightly bigger than anticipated but still great!
It fit as expected, the material is great. The buckles are sharp and can scratch you.

评论概述: Fits a little small but overall love it!
评论详情: I thankfully ordered an XL when I usually wear a M/L, and I’m glad I did cause that fit me perfectly! Material isn’t bad either and it’s super easy to put on and take off. Very pleased with it!
